title: Ruthless
description:
From International Bestselling Author, Dani René comes a dark, captivating story of forbidden romance.
“Women are pawns in a game for pleasure. Nothing more. Until her. Madison Parker.“I’ve done things that I’m not proud of. I’ve taken, I’ve killed, and I’ve blackmailed.But when she stumbles into my life, there’s nothing more I want than to steal her.She’s feisty, sassy, and so wrong for me. But that’s never stopped me before.I'm ruthless when I want something.Madison Parker will be mine. One way or another.*Dark romance that will take you on an emotional ride of want, need, and salvation.*
author: Dani René
